name: Silence
shortDescription: Together with a friend, take on the role of an agent and a hacker who must stop a military company from launching a dangerous combat robot.

name: Hide Away
shortDescription: Something new, this one was a bit of an experiment for me. Especially 'Do You Know' it's something completely different than my usual stuff. Hope you'll enjoy!
